TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseControlArray : System.ComponentModel.Component, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi abstract BaseControlArray extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public MustInherit Class BaseControlArray Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize
public ref class BaseControlArray abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::ComponentModel::ISupportInitialize

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 實作基本功能，該功能對升級自 Visual Basic 6.0 之應用程式中的控制項陣列而言很常用。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to control arrays in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會從繼承`BaseControlArray`。You do not typically inherit from `BaseControlArray`. 若要建立您自己的控制項陣列，繼承自中的控制項陣列類別的其中一個`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6`命名空間。To create your own control array, inherit from one of the control array classes in the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6` namespace. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyspecialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級應用程式中使用的所有控制項陣列的基底類別。The class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0. 通常不會使用這個類別建立類別的執行個體，因為通常不會直接呼叫這個建構函式，但而由衍生類別呼叫。Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyspecialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer Container) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對升級自 Visual Basic 6.0 之應用程式中使用的所有控制項陣列而言， 是基底類別。The class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0. 由於通常不會使用此類別建立類別的執行個體，因此通常不會直接呼叫這個 `Protected` 方法，而是由衍生類別呼叫。Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this `Protected` method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 在衍生的類別應該確定是正確的控制項陣列類型。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, do not call the method of the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性在[For...下一個陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-next-statement.md)控制項陣列中的執行在控制項上的作業。You can use this property in a [For...Next Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-next-statement.md) to perform an operation on the controls in a control array. 類別是從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級應用程式中使用的所有控制項陣列的基底類別。The class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放控制項陣列中某個控制項所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a control in a control array and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當您覆寫，請確定未參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When you override , make sure not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 儲存值，這個值表示控制項陣列容器的初始化程式碼是否已完成執行。

span.span: Stores a value indicating whether the initialization code for a control array's container has finished executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級應用程式中使用的所有控制項陣列的基底類別。The class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familynewslot virtual instance class System.Type GetControlInstanceType() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetControlInstanceType () As Type

This method must be overridden.

span.span: The class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

returns.span: 由於通常不會使用此類別建立類別的執行個體，因此通常不會直接呼叫這個 方法，而是由衍生類別呼叫。

span.span: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.

para.span: 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

para.span: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

span.span: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於 Visual Basic 6.0`Load`函式動態建立新的控制項陣列項目。This method is the equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 `Load` function for dynamically creating a new control array element. 類別是從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級應用程式中使用的所有控制項陣列的基底類別。The class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method newslot virtual instance void BeginInit() cil managed

summary.span: 開始控制項的初始化。

span.span: Begins the initialization of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計環境通常會使用這個方法來開始初始化用於表單或為另一個元件所使用的元件。Design environments typically use this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component. 方法結束初始化。The method ends the initialization. 使用`BeginInit`和方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。Using the `BeginInit` and methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized. 初始化發生於執行階段。The initialization occurs at run time. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 結束控制項的初始化。

span.span: Ends the initialization of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計環境通常會使用這個方法來完成初始化用於表單或為另一個元件所使用的元件。Design environments typically use this method to finish the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component. `EndInit`方法結束初始化。The `EndInit` method ends the initialization. 使用和`EndInit`方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。Using the and `EndInit` methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized. 初始化發生於執行階段。The initialization occurs at run time. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: A that represents the index of the control to remove.

summary.span: 從控制項陣列中移除控制項。

span.span: Removes a control from a control array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於 Visual Basic 6.0`Unload`函式，以動態方式移除控制項陣列項目。This method is the equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 `Unload` function for dynamically removing a control array element. > [!NOTE] > 利用以動態方式加入的控制項方法可以從控制項陣列中移除。Only controls that were added dynamically by using the method can be removed from the control array. 對升級自 Visual Basic 6.0 之應用程式中使用的所有控制項陣列而言， 是基底類別。The class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
